links.*: Of the Flight of the Noldor
Of the Sun and Moon and the Hiding of Valinor

wikitext.*:
{{ardayearheader|Year of the Trees 1496|Year of the Trees 1497|Year of the Trees 1498|Year of the Trees 1500|First Age 1|First Age 2|First Age 5}}

* The [[Valar]] complete the creation of the [[Sun]] and the [[Moon]], which will be guided by the [[Maiar]] [[Arien]] and [[Tilion]], respectively.<ref name="Narsilion">{{S|Sun}}</ref><ref name="AA">{{AA|173-9}}, pp. 131-3</ref>
* The Valar put great towers and sentinels around the [[Calacirya]]. From now, Valinor became [[Hiding of Valinor|hidden]] with the [[Enchanted Isles]] set about [[Tol Eressëa]].<ref name="Narsilion"/><ref>{{AA|180-1}}, pp.133-4</ref>
* The Moon rises above the World for the first time; Tilion traverses the heavens seven times before the coming of the Sun.<ref name="Narsilion"/><ref name="AA"/>
* At the first moonrise,<ref name="Narsilion"/><ref name="AA"/> the host of [[Fingolfin]] set foot upon [[Middle-earth]] after crossing the [[Helcaraxë]] with grievous losses.<ref name="Flight">{{S|Flight}}</ref><ref name="Helcaraxe">{{AA|163}}, p. 120</ref><ref>{{GA|52}}, pp. 29-30</ref>
** Death of [[Turgon|Turgon's]] wife and [[Idril|Idril's]] mother [[Elenwë]] in the icy waters of Helcaraxë.<ref name="Flight"/><ref name="Helcaraxe"/>
* [[Battle of the Lammoth]] is fought and Fingolfin's youngest son [[Argon]] is slain.<ref>{{PM|Shibboleth}}, p. 345 (note 38 on p. 362)</ref>
